CustomField.formula: IF( (ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c, "Deconversion")|| ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c, "Termination/Merger")|| ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c, "Abandonment"))&& Liquidation_Date__c <= TODAY(), Liquidation_Date__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c, "Contract Termination"), Inquiry_Date__c, Final_Valuation_Completed__c ))
CustomField.label: Transition Complete
